purpleculture_pinyin:
zhá
gear; brake; sluice; lock (on waterway); electric switch or circuit breaker
механизм; тормоз; шлюз; шлюз (на водном пути); электрический выключатель или автоматический выключатель
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 闸)
Pictophonetic: 甲 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
閘門 [ zhá mén ]: sluice gate
閘口 [ zhá kǒu ]: area in the Shangcheng district of Hangzhou
閘口 [ zhá kǒu ]: open sluice gate; (toll) station; boarding gate (airport etc); (fig.) gateway (access point)

heisig_chinese_memo: The floodgates are the gates that you open if there is a flood which is threatening to kill your radishes.
Ru_trainchinese:
zhá: (сущ) тормоз; переключатель
zhá: (сущ/глаг) шлюз
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The floodgates are the gates that you open if there is a flood which is threatening to kills your radishes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " door ", the sound of " A " means opening and closing the door. "Shuowen": "Open and close the door. From the door, the sound of a sound." Duan Yucai's note: "It is said that the pivoting rolling has a sound." " Sluice " means that the use of opening and closing doors is rarely seen in the literature. In the literature, " gates " often refer to water gates that can be opened and closed. Song Fan Zhongyan, "Shang Lu Xianggong and submitting a reference book to Zhongcheng": "The river of the new guide must be set up with gates, which are always blocked to protect against the tide, and the sand cannot be blocked."

" Gate " also means closing the gate and blocking the water, and then also generally refers to closing and blocking. "Zhu Ziyu Lei" Volume 59: "Like a stream of water, a lot of water stays in the gate at night, and this pool is full."

" Gate " also means cut off. "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 48: "The head crosses the head like a cut, the tail crosses like a stock, I am not afraid that you will be a god, one gate has two stages."

" Gate " can communicate with " Check ", which means audit. "Water Margin" Chapter 30: "It's often time for people to go to prison to watch."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " door ", the sound of " A " means opening and closing the door.
humanum_full_description:
從「門」，「甲」聲，表示開關門。《說文》：「開閉門也。从門，甲聲。」段玉裁注：「謂樞轉軋軋有聲。」「閘」表示開關門的用法鮮見於文獻。文獻中「閘」常表示可以啟閉的水門。宋范仲淹〈上呂相公並呈中丞諮目書〉：「新導之河，必設諸閘，常時扃之，禦其來潮，沙不能塞也。」

　　「閘」也表示關閘、把水截住，後亦泛指截止、攔。《朱子語類》卷五九：「如水之流，夜間則閘得許多水住在這裏，這一池水便滿。」

　　「閘」還表示截斷。《封神演義》第48回：「頭交頭如剪，尾交尾如股，不怕你得道神仙，一閘兩段。」

　　「閘」可與「查」通，表示稽查。《水滸全傳》第30回：「便差人常常下牢裏來閘看。」

(Simplified: 闸)
Pictophonetic: 甲 indicates the sound; 門 (gate) conveys the meaning.
Chinese: The floodgates are the gates that you open if there is a flood which is threatening to kill your radishes.
Meaning: floodgate
Hanzi: 闸
Story: The floodgates are the gates that you open if there is a flood which is threatening to kills your radishes.
Kind: traditional

從「 門 」，「 甲 」聲，表示開關門。《說文》：「開閉門也。从門，甲聲。」段玉裁注：「謂樞轉軋軋有聲。」「 閘 」表示開關門的用法鮮見於文獻。文獻中「 閘 」常表示可以啟閉的水門。宋范仲淹〈上呂相公並呈中丞諮目書〉：「新導之河，必設諸閘，常時扃之，禦其來潮，沙不能塞也。」 「 閘 」也表示關閘、把水截住，後亦泛指截止、攔。《朱子語類》卷五九：「如水之流，夜間則閘得許多水住在這裏，這一池水便滿。」 「 閘 」還表示截斷。《封神演義》第48回：「頭交頭如剪，尾交尾如股，不怕你得道神仙，一閘兩段。」 「 閘 」可與「 查 」通，表示稽查。《水滸全傳》第30回：「便差人常常下牢裏來閘看。」
From the " door", the sound of " A" means opening and closing the door. "Shuowen": "Open and close the door. From the door, the sound of a sound." Duan Yucai's note: "It is said that the pivoting rolling has a sound." " Sluice" means that the use of opening and closing doors is rarely seen in the literature. In the literature, " gates" often refer to water gates that can be opened and closed. Song Fan Zhongyan, "Shang Lu Xianggong and submitting a reference book to Zhongcheng": "The river of the new guide must be set up with gates, which are always blocked to protect against the tide, and the sand cannot be blocked." " Gate" also means closing the gate and blocking the water, and then also generally refers to closing and blocking. "Zhu Ziyu Lei" Volume 59: "Like a stream of water, a lot of water stays in the gate at night, and this pool is full." " Gate" also means cut off. "The Romance of the Gods" Chapter 48: "The head crosses the head like a cut, the tail crosses like a stock, I am not afraid that you will be a god, one gate has two stages." " Gate" can communicate with " Check", which means audit. "Water Margin" Chapter 30: "It's often time for people to go to prison to watch."

閘字的基本解释

閘
zhá
见“闸”。

閘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhá］
［《廣韻》烏甲切，入狎，影。］
［《篇海類編》直甲切］
“闸1”的繁体字。
(1)可以启闭的水门。
(2)把水截住。后亦泛指截止。
(3)截断。
(4)稽查。
(5)制动器的通称。
(6)电闸。
(7)铁路上的转辙器。
(8)通“狎”。
(9)见“閘喋”。

閘字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閘； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1333第12
【唐韻】烏甲切【集韻】乙甲切，?音押。【說文】開閉門也。　又【廣韻】古盍切【集韻】谷盍切，?音䫦。閉門也。　【正字通】字彙同牐。按今漕艘往來，臿石左右如門，設版瀦水，時啓閉以通舟，水門容一舟，銜尾貫行，門曰閘門，河曰閘河。設閘官司之。說文：開閉門也。未詳。字彙汎云，同牐，非。

閘字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

閘字的起名意思

暂无。

(5) The general term for brakes.
